basics.name: Srividhya Chandrasekharan
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a passionate and collaborative software engineer with 6 years of experience dedicated to delivering impactful solutions that make a difference. My technical expertise includes Java, Python, and Kubernetes. I am a Certified Kubernetes Application Developer and a Certified Kubernetes Administrator.

work.summary: As a skilled software engineer with experience at Nokia, Iâ€™ve contributed to high-impact projects that shape the future of global communication.
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website
Drive, design and build student-community projects for UH Manoa
Taught a class of 40 students CSE 1222: Introduction to Computer Programming in C++.
Administered lab sessions, evaluated their homework, lab and quiz submissions.
Maintained weekly office hours and problem-solving sessions.
Administered and graded midterm and final exams.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network

Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
